Title: Green Days by the River
Writer: Michael Anthony (based on the novel by), Dawn Cumberbatch (screenplay by)
Actors: Vanessa Bartholomew, Dara Healy, Nadia Kandhai, Anand Lawkaran
Plot: In Trinidad, British West Indies, 1954 - The coming of age story of a fifteen-year-old boy from the coastal village of Mayaro.
